subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The owner of the Memphis Grizzlies and the team’s staff met with the 34-year-old guard Allen Iverson, moving closer to a deal bringing him to the team. Last season, the Grizzlies finished 24-58, last in their division.
snippet: The owner of the Memphis Grizzlies and the team’s staff met with the 34-year-old guard Allen Iverson, moving closer to a deal bringing him to the team. Last season, the Grizzlies finished 24-58, last in their division.
